text: É ɠɛni ti ma: «À li, wo Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazaɠa bɛ̀, nuɓusɛi mɔtai pɛ bɛ ɓalaa, ti Izilayɛle yooi zu ta Zuda, tɔɔzei sɛʋɛi nii zu wooi ʋa, nii kaai. Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-ziiɠaawanai wola wɔɔlɔʋɛ, ná-ziiɠaawanai yeiɗa ade ma, mazɔlɔɔ ade-mɛmɛwolani ti la ɠoloni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ʋɛ, ti ʋa naa ɠɛ nii kpein sɛʋɛai su.»
